resources.string: Shakedown, 1979 Cool kids never have the time On a live wire right up off the street You and I should meet June bug skipping like a stone With the headlights pointed at the dawn We were sure wed never see an end to it all
I can help you through this But you have to take my hand I can take you home Take my hand, take my hand
Terngiang dua bisikan di telinga ku Takkan mampu merubah semua waktu Dan lihatlah diri ku disini kan berdiri menatap mu
Selama aku masih bisa bernafas Masih sanggup berjalan kukan slalu memujamu Meski ku tak tahu lagi engkau ada dimana Dengarkan aku kumerindukanmu
But I love you so (ooh-ooh) I love you so (ooh-ooh) I love you so (ooh-ooh) I love you so (ooh-ooh)
I SEE YOUR EYES WITH MY RESPECT THERE ARE SO BRIGHT THAT LIGHT SHINE THROUGH INSIDE MY HEART YOU LOOK PERFECT YOU NEVER CHANGE WITH ANYTHING

I buy a new car for the bitch (For real) I tear down the mall with the bitch (For real) You cannot even talk to the bitch (No) She fucking with bosses and shit (On God) I pull up in Raris and shit (Skrrr)
Katakan apa yang sebenarnya telah terjadi Hingga kau tega tebarkan debu neraka Ku hanya ingin mengukir kesucian Dan kau pun hancurkan
The words you speak destroy our world You never learn youre always wanting more This misery is never let me free
When youre on a holiday You cant find the words to say All the things that come to you And I wanna feel it too
